page.title: 15Leisure Pursuits
page.content: The area has many advantages for purposeful use of leisure time. The{ {Marsh}area is splendid for walking and cycling as it is so flat. The lanes are almost traffic free (except in summer when many tourists visit the area). The Burrows is an ideal place for taking exercise walking, jogging or nature rambles. During the last ten years there has been a dramatic increase in the amount of sailing and surfing on the coast and in the estuary. This increase is mainly due to the popularity of windsurfing. Windsurfing is performed on a sailboard - a cross between a yacht and a surfboard. Several workshops and small factories in and around{Braunton} produce sailboards and windsurfing equipment.
